Reviews.Title: WOW! THIS TV IS FANTASTIC!
Reviews.Author: VAL
Reviews.Content: THE PICTURE QUALITY OF THIS TV IS SPACTACULAR. PREVIOUSLY HAVING A 55" LCD TV (LG55LH40), THIS TV APPEARS SO MUCH LARGER AND THE PICTURE REALLY FILLS THE ROOM. THE COLORS ARE MUCH MORE VIBRANT AND THE PICTURE IS MUCH LIGHTER, BUT WITH FULL COLOR. WITH ALL LIGHTS TURNED OFF IN THE ROOM, THE TV FILLS THE ROOM WITH ADEQUATE LIGHTING AT NIGHT, WITH THE PICTURE STILL EXPLODING WITH COLOR, STILL PROVIDING DEEP DARK HUES AND BLACKS. I LOVE THIS TV. IT IS BY FAR THE BEST TV THAT I HAVE EVER PURCHASED.

Reviews.Title: Great HD Picture
Reviews.Author: Tom
Reviews.Content: Great HD picture.  Moderate SD picture (but mostly due to TV being so large).  One dead pixel on arrival.  Concerned that the LG WI FI dongle has poor reviews and hoping LG invests in a new WI FI dongle compatible with this TV.  Owned 2 months.

ProductInfo.Features:
150,000:1 Dynamic Contrast Ratio
Full HD 1080p Resolution
NetCast Entertainment Access (Wi-Fi Ready)
Wireless 1080p Ready
TruMotion 120Hz
ProductInfo.Name: LG 60LD550 60" LD550 Series 1080p LCD HDTV - Glossy Black/Noble Titan
